list.name: Changes
list.comment:
fix: dark mode readability and preview resolution
- Replace all hardcoded hex colors with palette() references for automatic light/dark theme adaptation - PreviewPanel, toggle buttons, row widgets, labels all palette-aware - Raise preview render minimum from 200px to 800px wide - Raise max_height from 800 to 1200 for sharper page rendering - Remove alternatingRowColors (conflicts with custom row widgets)

task.summary:
feat: project scaffolding and minimal window launch
- Create pdfjoiner package with __init__, model, service, view stubs - Add main.py entry point with PySide6 QApplication bootstrap - Add pyproject.toml with project metadata and dependencies - Add requirements.txt (PySide6, PyMuPDF) - Add .gitignore for Python/IDE/OS artifacts - Minimal MainWindow launches at 900x600 with placeholder label

feat: add data model with FileEntry and ProjectModel
- FileEntry dataclass with path, included flag, page_count, thumbnail - ProjectModel with add_files, add_folder, remove, clear, move, toggle - Skips unsupported extensions and duplicate paths on add - Single list_changed signal emitted on every mutation - Smoke test in main.py to verify model operations via console

feat: add MergeService for preview rendering and PDF merging
- render_preview / render_thumbnail via PyMuPDF → QPixmap - render_merged_preview for full merged document preview - merge() combines included PDFs and images into single output PDF - Images inserted at native resolution, corrupt files skipped gracefully - Smoke test in main.py exercises page count, thumbnails, and merge

feat: build main window layout with file list and merge controls
- Toolbar: Add Files, Add Folder, Remove, Move Up/Down with shortcuts - File list with checkboxes for include/exclude, grayed-out styling - Multi-select support for bulk removal - Output filename field + Save Merged PDF button with save dialog - Status bar showing file count and included count - Preview placeholder panel ready for Step 5 - Remove smoke test from main.py — UI is now the interface

feat: add preview panel with page navigation and merged preview
- PreviewPanel widget with single-file and merged preview modes - Single-file: renders current page, Prev/Next navigation for PDFs - Merged: renders all included pages stacked vertically, scrollable - Preview Merged button in bottom bar - Auto-preview on file list selection change

feat: add drag-and-drop reordering and OS file drops
- FileListWidget subclass with internal drag reorder via model - External file/folder drops from OS file manager onto file list - Main window also accepts drops anywhere (toolbar, preview, etc.) - Folders recursively scanned, unsupported files silently skipped - Status bar hints at drag-and-drop in empty state

feat: add drag-and-drop reordering and OS file drops
- FileListWidget subclass with internal drag reorder via model - External file/folder drops from OS file manager onto file list - Main window also accepts drops anywhere (toolbar, preview, etc.) - Folders recursively scanned, unsupported files silently skipped - Status bar hints at drag-and-drop in empty state

feat: visual insertion gap during drag-and-drop reordering
- Custom _DropIndicatorDelegate inflates sizeHint to open a gap - Blue-tinted insertion zone with horizontal line and dot endpoints - Gap tracks cursor position with top/bottom half hit-testing - Hides gap when hovering over dragged item's own position - Gap also shown for external OS file drops - Disables Qt's built-in drop indicator line

feat: output options dialog with page numbers and watermark
- PageNumberOptions, WatermarkOptions, OutputOptions dataclasses in model - _apply_page_numbers stamps formatted numbers at 6 positions with alignment - _apply_watermark stamps rotated semi-transparent text via matrix transform - merge() accepts optional OutputOptions, applies after assembly - OutputOptionsDialog with Page Numbers and Watermark tabs - Editable format presets, opacity slider, color dropdown, position picker - Options button in bottom bar, settings persist within session - Errors in stamp application captured as warnings, not fatal

fix: scale page numbers and watermark relative to each page's size
- Reference height of 842pt (A4) used as baseline for user-facing values - Font size and margin multiplied by page.height/842 per page - Fixes invisible text on high-resolution images and oversized text on small pages - Coordinates clamped to page bounds to prevent off-page rendering - Font object created once outside loop for efficiency

fix: three bugs in page stamps — opacity, rotation, preview rendering
- Watermark: use Shape.finish(fill_opacity=) instead of unsupported insert_text(fill_opacity=) parameter (silently ignored) - Watermark: build proper rotation matrix from cos/sin instead of fitz.Matrix(angle) which is a scaling matrix, not rotation - Preview: flush doc (tobytes + reopen) before get_pixmap so newly inserted text overlays are visible in merged preview - Page numbers: also use Shape objects for consistency

feat: click-to-place text annotations on merged preview pages
- TextAnnotation dataclass with normalised coordinates (model.py) - _apply_annotations stamps text during merge (service.py) - AnnotatedPageWidget with click handler and overlay painting (view.py) - AnnotationDialog for text, font size, color entry (view.py) - Clear Annotations button in bottom bar - Annotations survive output options dialog changes - README updated with annotation feature

feat: annotation management — select, drag-move, edit, delete
- AnnotatedPageWidget: hit-testing, selection highlight, drag-to-move, double-click edit, Delete key, right-click context menu - AnnotationDialog: edit mode with pre-filled values - PreviewPanel: forward move/edit/delete signals - MainWindow: handlers for move (in-place), edit (dialog), delete - Cursor feedback: crosshair, open hand on hover, closed hand on drag - Page hint text updated with interaction instructions

feat: UX improvements — unified add, annotate toggle, delete key, options bar
- Replace Add Files + Add Folder with single "Add…" button using non-native QFileDialog that accepts both files and directories - Add checkable "✏ Annotate" toolbar toggle — clicks only create annotations when mode is on; select/move/edit/delete always work - Fix Delete key: route to annotation delete when one is selected, otherwise remove files from list (was intercepted by toolbar action) - Add options bar with Page Numbers / Watermark quick-toggle checkboxes and Settings button; bottom bar simplified to output + save only - Cursor feedback: arrow by default, crosshair only in annotate mode - README shortcuts table updated

fix: dark mode readability and preview resolution
- Replace all hardcoded hex colors with palette() references for automatic light/dark theme adaptation - PreviewPanel, toggle buttons, row widgets, labels all palette-aware - Raise preview render minimum from 200px to 800px wide - Raise max_height from 800 to 1200 for sharper page rendering - Remove alternatingRowColors (conflicts with custom row widgets)
